descriptions.BerryEditorProps.value: Controlled HTML value. When provided, editor runs in controlled mode.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.onHTMLSanitizeNotice: Called when unsafe HTML is removed while committing HTML mode changes.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.onSelectionChange: Receives selection updates from the editor engine.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.onFocus: Focus callback for host app integrations.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.onBlur: Blur callback for host app integrations.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.readOnly: Prevents editing while keeping content visible.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.required: Enables form validity enforcement when used with `name`.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.name: Form field name for hidden proxy textarea submission.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.placeholder: Placeholder text for an empty editor.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.linkPageOptions: Optional nested page tree for the first link tab.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.linkPageTabLabel: Optional label override for the first link tab.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.onSearchLinkPages: Optional async search hook for the first link tab.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.linkPageOptions2: Optional nested page tree for the second link tab.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.linkPageTab2Label: Optional label override for the second link tab.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.onSearchLinkPages2: Optional async search hook for the second link tab.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.emojiPicker: Configuration for built-in Unicode 17 + Twemoji picker.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.fontFamilyOptions: Custom font family options merged with defaults.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.colorPicker: Swatches and custom render/adapter for text/highlight color pickers.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.enableHTMLMode: Shows or hides rich/HTML mode toggle.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.showCategoryLabels: Shows/hides category labels under toolbar control groups.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.toolbarLayout: Per-category visibility/order/row overrides for toolbar layout.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.toolbarItems: Per-item toolbar visibility using showOnly/hideOnly lists. All items render by default.
descriptions.BerryEditorHandle.getHTML(): Returns current HTML. In HTML mode, commits sanitized draft first.
descriptions.BerryEditorHandle.setHTML(html): Replaces editor content with provided HTML.
descriptions.BerryEditorHandle.exec(command, payload?: Executes editor command with optional payload.
descriptions.BerryToolbarProps.readOnly: Read-only presentation mode for toolbar actions.
descriptions.BerryToolbarProps.onCommand: Command dispatch callback for toolbar controls.
descriptions.BerryToolbarProps.canInsertImage: Whether image insert control should be enabled.
descriptions.BerryToolbarProps.canInsertDocument: Whether document insert control should be enabled.
descriptions.BerryToolbarProps.onInsertEmoji: Insert selected emoji into editor content.
descriptions.BerryToolbarProps.onSearchLinkPages: Async search hook for first page-tab.
descriptions.BerryToolbarProps.onSearchLinkPages2: Async search hook for second page-tab.
descriptions.BerryToolbarProps.fontFamilyOptions: Font family list displayed by toolbar typography controls.
descriptions.BerryToolbarProps.showFormattingControls: Show or hide rich-text formatting categories.
descriptions.BerryToolbarProps.showCategoryLabels: Show or hide category labels under groups.
descriptions.BerryToolbarProps.showHTMLToggle: Show or hide the mode-toggle category.
descriptions.BerryToolbarProps.isHTMLMode: Current mode state for mode-toggle button label/state.
descriptions.BerryToolbarProps.onToggleHTMLMode: Toggle callback for switching rich/HTML modes.
descriptions.BerryToolbarProps.toolbarItems: Per-item visibility controls using showOnly/hideOnly lists.
descriptions.Type.UploadContext: Context passed to upload adapters for cancellation + progress reporting.
descriptions.Type.UploadResult: Attachment metadata returned by image/document uploads.
descriptions.Type.ImageAdapter: Image upload adapter for picker, paste, and drag-drop flows.
descriptions.Type.DocumentAdapter: Document upload adapter for picker, paste, and drag-drop flows.
descriptions.Type.EmojiInsertMode: Shared insert mode type for picker options and insert payloads.
descriptions.Type.EmojiTone: Skin tone preference type used by built-in picker.
descriptions.Type.EmojiGender: Gender presentation preference type used by built-in picker variants.
descriptions.Type.EmojiInsertPayload: Insert payload emitted by built-in picker for controlled emoji insertion.
descriptions.Type.EmojiPickerOptions.insertMode: Controls whether picker inserts Twemoji `` HTML or Unicode text.
descriptions.Type.EmojiPickerOptions.twemojiBaseUrl: Override CDN base URL for Twemoji assets.
descriptions.Type.EmojiPickerOptions.useTwemoji: Controls picker tile rendering: Twemoji `` assets when true, native Unicode glyphs when false.
descriptions.Type.EmojiPickerOptions.recentLimit: Max recent emojis stored in picker model.
descriptions.Type.EmojiPickerOptions.showCategories: Shows category selector; set to false to render a single unified emoji list.
descriptions.Type.ColorPickerOptions.swatches: Custom swatches for text/highlight color pickers.
descriptions.Type.ColorPickerOptions.render: Fully custom React render hook for picker UI.
descriptions.Type.ColorPickerOptions.adapter: Imperative adapter API for non-React picker integrations.
descriptions.Type.ColorPickerKind: Picker kind distinguishing text color vs highlight flows.
descriptions.Type.ColorPickerAdapter.mount: Mount callback with host container and picker state.
descriptions.Type.BerryToolbarCategoryKey: Category identifiers used by toolbar layout overrides.
descriptions.Type.BerryToolbarLayout: Partial map configuring category rows and order.
descriptions.Type.BerryToolbarItemKey: Individual toolbar control identifiers used by per-item visibility config.
descriptions.Type.BerryToolbarItemsConfig: Controls per-item toolbar visibility. hideOnly is applied after showOnly.
descriptions.Type.SelectionRange: Serialized selection offsets exposed by the editor handle.
descriptions.Type.parseHTML(html): Parse HTML into BerryEditor document model.
descriptions.Type.serializeHTML(document): Serialize editor document model to HTML.
descriptions.Type.documentFromHTML(html): Build model document from HTML canonical source.
descriptions.Type.documentToHTML(document): Convert model document back to HTML.
descriptions.Type.InlineMark: Supported inline mark identifiers in model text nodes.
descriptions.Type.AttachmentNode: Attachment inline node used for images/documents and pending upload placeholders.
descriptions.Type.InlineNode: Inline model node union used within text and table cells.
descriptions.Type.ListType: List style for list item blocks.
descriptions.Type.EditorDocument: Canonical model document structure used by parser/serializer helpers.
descriptions.Type.EditorEngine: Low-level editor engine powering `BerryEditor`; use for advanced host integrations that need direct bind/load/exec control.
descriptions.Type.EditorCommand: Command union type accepted by `exec` and toolbar command bridge callbacks.
descriptions.Type.UNICODE_EMOJI_VERSION: Unicode Emoji data version used by built-in catalog.
descriptions.Type.UNICODE_FULLY_QUALIFIED_COUNT: Count of fully-qualified Unicode emoji entries in bundled catalog.
descriptions.Type.TWEMOJI_VERSION: Twemoji asset version used by built-in picker.
descriptions.Type.DEFAULT_TWEMOJI_BASE_URL: Default CDN base URL for Twemoji SVG assets.
descriptions.BerryEditorProps.toolbarLoading: Replaces the toolbar UI with a non-interactive skeleton while loading.
descriptions.BerryToolbarProps.onPrepareInsert: Optional hook fired before insert popovers/actions so hosts can preserve selection state.
descriptions.BerryToolbarProps.loading: Renders non-interactive toolbar skeleton placeholders while host data is loading.

commandNotes.link: Create/update link for selection, or insert provided text as a link.
commandNotes.clearHighlight: Remove highlight from the nearest highlighted parent at cursor.
commandNotes.insertTable: Insert table with dimensions and optional black 1px cell borders.
commandNotes.tableAddColumnLeft: Insert table column on left side.
commandNotes.tableAddColumnRight: Insert table column on right side.
